optionTypes.name: Name Pattern
optionTypes.description:
Name pattern uses ${variable} string interpolation. Available variables are:
groupName, groupCode, cloudName, cloudCode, type, accountId, account, accountType, platform, username, userId, userInitials, provisionType

optionTypes.name: Notification message
optionTypes.defaultValue: Instance ${instance?.name} is set to expire on ${instance?.expireDate}

optionTypes.name: Hide Fixed Shutdown
optionTypes.helpBlock: Hide Power Schedule if fixed value

optionTypes.name: Notification message
optionTypes.defaultValue: Instance ${instance?.name} is set to shutdown on ${instance?.shutdownDate}

optionTypes.name: Extensions before approval
optionTypes.helpBlock: Configures the number of extensions allowed before approval is required.
